titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the Secretary of State should designate a special envoy to negotiate the release of Americans held hostage in Lebanon.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 12/16/1987--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Secretary of State should designate a special envoy to negotiate the release of American and all other hostages in Lebanon, and appeals to their captors to free them.
